column4: have you read this info? https://help.ubuntu.com/community/CompilingEasyHowTo
no havent thank you :)
or have you looked at getdeb.net to see if there is a prebuilt deb of what you want?
that getdeb site is super useful
I'm not finding a deb for a twitter plugin, leaves compiling from source or adding the info to the sources.list file

thats becoming clear *sigh* it seems like everytime i cant find a way to do what i'm tryingt o do there is some other better way that everyone else is doing that i ddint know about heheh, do you happen to use twitter at all?
no, I find sites like twitter and myspace to be a waste of my time
twitter is extremely spammy, myspace is loathsome but both represent exclusive means of communication with some of my less than tech savvy friends :)
if someone can't use msn or call me, I don't need to talk to them :)
i'm strongly considering taking that attitude to heart :P
having a repo to update the program for you would be more stable as you may not know about updates that could fix issues .... I also avoid youtube and other "junk" like that
noted, i'll go that route... Blaphemer! I'm a youtube addict :)
I may go to hell for it but I won't be alone, all my friends will be there ;)
good company is very important..
erUSUL, etc thanks for the help guys :)
